[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: ShortArray(
                Bracketed {
                    left_bracket: Span(
                        3,
                        1,
                    ),
                    inner: CommaSeparated {
                        inner: [
                            ArrayItem {
                                key: Some(
                                    Variable(
                                        SimpleVariable(
                                            SimpleVariable {
                                                span: Span(
                                                    3,
                                                    2,
                                                ),
                                                name: "foo",
                                            },
                                        ),
                                    ),
                                ),
                                value: Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span(
                                                3,
                                                11,
                                            ),
                                            name: "bar",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                                unpack: false,
                                by_ref: true,
                            },
                        ],
                        commas: [],
                    },
                    right_bracket: Span(
                        3,
                        15,
                    ),
                },
            ),
            semicolon: Span(
                3,
                16,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
